meanings.sent1: The anhedonic patient found no joy in activities that once made them happy.
meanings.sent2: She felt anhedonic even when surrounded by laughter and celebration.
meanings.sent3: The anhedonic cat refused to play with any toys, not even the ones filled with catnip.
meanings.sent4: His anhedonic outlook on life painted everything in shades of gray, devoid of any color or excitement.
meanings.sent5: The anhedonic clouds hung heavy in the sky, blocking out the warmth of the sun.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of interest or enjoyment
meanings.sent1: The anhedonic student stared blankly at the boring lecture, uninterested in the topic.
meanings.sent2: Her anhedonic expression gave away her lack of enthusiasm for the party.
meanings.sent3: The anhedonic puppy yawned at the thought of going for a walk, preferring to nap instead.
meanings.sent4: The anhedonic moviegoer sat through the film without a single smile, unmoved by the plot twists.
meanings.sent5: His anhedonic attitude towards social gatherings made him the quietest person in the room.
